function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of well-studied learning methods","Impact":"Inefficient learning strategies and potential decrease in educational quality","Mitigation":"Conducting retrospective studies to generate hypotheses about efficient learning methods","Technologies":"Distance learning tools, educational teleconferences","People":"Learners, educators","Owner":"Surgical organizations, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Rapidly evolving crisis","Impact":"Difficulty in adapting to changing circumstances and implementing effective education strategies","Mitigation":"Flexible and adaptive learning methods, cooperation between institutions, regionalization of educational teleconferences","Technologies":"Educational teleconferences, access to surgical video libraries","People":"Learners, educators, surgical residency programs","Owner":"Surgical organizations, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Physical and mental safety of learners","Impact":"Risk to the well-being of learners during the crisis","Mitigation":"Implementation of distance learning tools, preservation of learner safety as a priority","Technologies":"Distance learning tools","People":"Learners, educators, surgical residency programs","Owner":"Surgical organizations, academic institutions"}]}
